title: New Stunning 4 Bedroom Luxury Sea View Villas in Bophut
description:
Villa Types & Prices:

Type A: (Villas 1,2,3)
4 Bedroom + 2 Bedroom Annex Option
Built Size: Sq m 700-1,000
Land Size: Sq m 923

Type B: (Villas 4,5,6,7)
4 Bedrooms + Studio Garden Room Option
Built Size: Sq m 500-700
Land Size: Sq m 665

Key Features
- 7 Large Villas on 4 rais plots of land
- Exclusive residence located in Bophut
- Easy and gentle slope access by car
- Large size infinity-pool
- Indoor garden
- Gym with sea view
- Lift and ramp accessible
- Indoor and outdoor living
- Indoor and outdoor kitchen
- Annex 2 bedroom option
- Studio room option
- CCTV and Security guards
- Furnitures package available (optional)
- Freehold tenure / chanote title
- Government electric and water

Location:
The residence is located in a very quiet area in Soi Thong Hor in Bophut.  An easy and gentle slope for driving by car leads to a private road access only.
- 2 minutes drive from main ring road
- 5 minutes from Fisherman Village and Bophut Beach
- 15 minutes to Airport, Choeng Mon and Chaweng Beach
- 25 minutes to Nathon ferry pier

Location details:
- Area: Bophut
- City: Koh Samui
- Country: Thailand
